BotCommand.name: poll
BotCommand.HelpText: Commands for starting, stopping and voting in polls.

BotCommand.name: start
BotCommand.HelpText: Syntax: poll start <u>question<u> <u>answer1<u> [<u>answer2<u> ... <u>answerN<u>] Starts a poll on the current channel specified <u>question<u> and <u>answer<u>s. Enclose items in quotes if they have spaces in them.

BotCommand.name: progress
BotCommand.HelpText: Displays the number of votes cast so far in the active poll on the channel.

BotCommand.name: end
BotCommand.HelpText: Ends the active poll on the channel and displays the results.

BotCommand.name: vote
BotCommand.HelpText: Syntax: poll vote <u>channel<u> <u>number<u> Casts a vote for the poll on the specified <u>channel<u> for the answer with the specified <u>number<u>. Can only be used in a private message.
